          <title>
            <string language="en">Fuel combustion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraftstoffverbrennung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Combustion de carburant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combustão do combustível</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Combustione del combustibile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καύση καυσίμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Combustión del combustible</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the components involved in a fuel combustion. This can be used as a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Bestandteile,
die in eine Kraftstoffverbrennung mit einbezogen werden. Dieses 
kann als beschriftende Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre les composants impliqués 
dans une combustion de carburant. Ceci peut être utilisé comme
exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra os componentes envolvidos 
em uma combustão do combustível. Isto pode ser usado como um 
exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra i componenti addetti ad 
una combustione del combustibile. Ciò può essere usata come 
esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί τα συστατικά που 
περιλαμβάνονται σε μια καύση καυσίμων. Αυτό μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra los componentes implicados
